title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy – 2022 Letter to Joe Biden – the US President
author: admin
summary: The letter made by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, on 20 November 2022.
content:
Your Excellency!

You have dedicated Your life to serving the ideals of democracy. Your political activity is an example for many generations of politicians. For Ukraine, You are the leader of the free world, who consolidates international efforts aimed at protecting the fundamental values ​​of freedom and justice.
